ARABIC: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So your Lord's Words about those who are kafir proved true, that they are indeed the Companions of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In this way the sentence of your Lord against the infidels that they would be the inmates of Hell, was justified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus has the decree of your Lord become due against the unbelievers. They are destined for the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The word of your Lord that the disbelievers will be the dwellers of hell fire has already been decreed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And this is how the Word of your Lord has proved true upon the disbelievers that they are people of the hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus has the Word of your Lord been justified against those who disbelieved, that they will be the dwellers of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And thus did the word of your Lord prove true against those who disbelieved that they are the inmates of the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so the Word of thy Lord was realised against the unbelievers, that they are the inhabitants of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus was the word of thy Lord concerning those who disbelieve fulfilled: That they are owners of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus has the word of your Lord come true against the deniers; they shall be the inmates of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thus hath the Word of thy Lord been justified on those who disbelieve: that they shall be the fellows of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is how the word of your Lord became due concerning the faithless, that they shall be inmates of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus was the Decree of thy Lord proved true against the Unbelievers; that truly they are Companions of the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus has the Word of your Lord been justified against those who disbelieved, that they will be the dwellers of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And so it is that the Word of your Lord shall be realized against the unbelievers they are the inhabitants of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus the sentence of your Lord became realized against those who disbelieve, that they are to be inmates of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:6] And thus was the word of your Lord — namely, the verse: Assuredly I will fill Hell … [Q. 11:119] — fulfilled against those who disbelieve: that they shall be the inhabitants of the Fire (annahum ashābu’l-nāri substitutes for kalimatu, ‘the word’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus was the word of thy Lord) to punish (concerning those who disbelieve) in the messengers (fulfilled) ordained: (that they are owners of the Fire) that they are the inhabitants of the Fire in the Hereafter.
